doc.field: Tamiment Library Web Collection on Organizations
Tamiment Library Web Collection on Organizations
Combatant Status Review Tribunal (CSRT) and Administrative Review Board (ARB) Documents Archived Website
Combatant Status Review Tribunal (CSRT) and Administrative Review Board (ARB) Documents Archived Website

Contains unclassified summaries of evidence for Combatant Status Review Tribunals held between July 2004 and July 2007. Included are summaries for High Value Detainees (HVD). Other documents and audio recordings of testimony for HVD can be found on the Detainee Affairs webpage of DefenseLint at: http://www.defenselink.mil/news/Combatant_Tribunals.html.
